member.name: T:BlobHelper.AwsSettings
member.summary: Settings when using AWS S3 for storage.

member.name: P:BlobHelper.AwsSettings.Endpoint
member.summary: Override the AWS S3 endpoint (if using non-Amazon storage), otherwise leave null. Use the form http://localhost:8000/

member.name: P:BlobHelper.AwsSettings.Ssl
member.summary: Enable or disable SSL (only if using non-Amazon storage).

member.name: P:BlobHelper.AwsSettings.BaseUrl
member.summary: Base URL to use for objects, i.e. https://[bucketname].s3.[regionname].amazonaws.com/. For non-S3 endpoints, use {bucket} and {key} to indicate where these values should be inserted, i.e. http://{bucket}.[hostname]:[port]/{key} or https://[hostname]:[port]/{bucket}/key.

member.name: M:BlobHelper.AwsSettings.#ctor(System.String,System.String,BlobHelper.AwsRegion,System.String)
member.param: Access key with which to access AWS S3.
Secret key with which to access AWS S3.
Bucket in which to store BLOBs.

member.name: M:BlobHelper.AwsSettings.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.param: Access key with which to access AWS S3.
Secret key with which to access AWS S3.
Bucket in which to store BLOBs.

member.name: M:BlobHelper.AwsSettings.#ctor(System.String,System.String,BlobHelper.AwsRegion,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.param: Access key with which to access AWS S3.
Secret key with which to access AWS S3.
Bucket in which to store BLOBs.

member.name: M:BlobHelper.AwsSettings.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.param: Access key with which to access AWS S3.
Secret key with which to access AWS S3.
Bucket in which to store BLOBs.

member.name: M:BlobHelper.AwsSettings.#ctor(System.String,System.Boolean,System.String,System.String,BlobHelper.AwsRegion,System.String,System.String)
member.param: Override the AWS S3 endpoint (if using non-Amazon storage). Use the form http://localhost:8000/.
Access key with which to access AWS S3.
Secret key with which to access AWS S3.
Bucket in which to store BLOBs.

Base URL to use for objects, i.e. https://[bucketname].s3.[regionname].amazonaws.com/. For non-S3 endpoints, use {bucket} and {key} to indicate where these values should be inserted, i.e. http://{bucket}.[hostname]:[port]/{key} or https://[hostname]:[port]/{bucket}/key.

member.name: M:BlobHelper.AwsSettings.#ctor(System.String,System.Boolean,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.param: Override the AWS S3 endpoint (if using non-Amazon storage). Use the form http://localhost:8000/.
Access key with which to access AWS S3.
Secret key with which to access AWS S3.
Bucket in which to store BLOBs.

Base URL to use for objects, i.e. https://[bucketname].s3.[regionname].amazonaws.com/. For non-S3 endpoints, use {bucket} and {key} to indicate where these values should be inserted, i.e. http://{bucket}.[hostname]:[port]/{key} or https://[hostname]:[port]/{bucket}/key.

member.name: T:BlobHelper.AzureSettings
member.summary: Settings when using Microsoft Azure BLOB Storage for storage.

member.name: P:BlobHelper.AzureSettings.AccountName
member.summary: Microsoft Azure BLOB storage account name (the name of the account in the Azure portal).

member.name: P:BlobHelper.AzureSettings.AccessKey
member.summary: Microsoft Azure BLOB storage access key.

member.name: P:BlobHelper.AzureSettings.Endpoint
member.summary: Microsoft Azure BLOB storage endpoint (primary or secondary from the Azure portal, likely of the form https://[accountname].blob.core.windows.net/.

member.name: M:BlobHelper.AzureSettings.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.param: The access key with which to access Azure BLOB storage.
The Azure BLOB storage endpoint for the account.
The container in which BLOBs should be stored.

member.name: T:BlobHelper.BlobData
member.summary: Contains content-length (how many bytes to read) and data stream for a given object.

member.name: P:BlobHelper.BlobData.ContentLength
member.summary: Content-length of the object (how many bytes to read from Data).

member.name: P:BlobHelper.BlobMetadata.CreatedUtc
member.summary: Timestamp from when the object was created.

member.name: P:BlobHelper.BlobMetadata.LastUpdateUtc
member.summary: Timestamp from when the object was last updated, if available.

member.name: P:BlobHelper.BlobMetadata.LastAccessUtc
member.summary: Timestamp from when the object was last accessed, if available.

member.name: M:BlobHelper.BlobMetadata.ToString
member.summary: Create a human-readable string of the object.
